data.quote: The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.
data.author: Aristotle Onassis

data.quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember--the only taste of success some people get is to take a bite out of you.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
data.author: Charles F. Kettering

data.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
data.author: Lou Holtz

data.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: If you quit ONCE it becomes a habit.Never quit!!!
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: It is good to dream big but your dreams will never see the light of day if you sleep big too.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: One day you will wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted. Do it now
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
data.author: Swami Sivananda

data.quote: Success is not the result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
data.author: Reggie Leach

data.quote: Always remember that the future comes one day at a time.
data.author: Dean Acheson

data.quote: You're going to go through tough times - that's life. But I say, 'Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.' See the positive in negative events.
data.author: Joel Osteen

data.quote: To be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Do more of what makes you happy.
data.author: Carmel McConnell

data.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you'll never get it done.
data.author: Bruce Lee

data.quote: You can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.
data.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

data.quote: It is possible to commit no mistakes and still lose. That is not a weakness; that is life.
data.author: Jean Luc Picard

data.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Wake up early and tackle the day before it tackles you. Be on offense, not defense.
data.author: Evan Carmichael

data.quote: You can have anything you want if you are willing to give up the belief that you can't have it.
data.author: Robert Anthony

data.quote: Successful people are not gifted; they just work hard, then succeed on purpose.
data.author: G.K.Nielson

data.quote: Do it now.Sometimes 'later' becomes 'never'.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: FEarly to bed and early to rise, makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do today.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius
